data.title: SonicWall Unwraps Monthly Firewall Security Service Suites for MSSPs, MSPs -
data.meta_description: SonicWall has rolled out monthly firewall security services bundles for MSSPs and MSPs.
data.text:
SonicWall, a network security provider selling exclusively through channel partners, has rolled out monthly firewall security services bundles for managed security service providers (MSSPs) and approved managed service providers (MSPs).

Flexible and Cost-Effective Solutions for MSPs, MSSPs

The collections, which include SonicWall's currently available security offerings, are intended to provide MSSPs and approved MSPs with flexible, cost-effective cybersecurity solutions, the company said in a prepared statement.

SonicWall MSSPs and approved MSPs can bill customers monthly for the company’s security services included in three tiers for SonicWall Generation 7 appliances:

The suites feature a range of critical firewall security services, including the Capture Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) sandbox service, Real-Time Deep Memory Inspection as well as intrusion prevention and application control, content filtering and reporting capabilities.

SonicWall president and chief executive Bob VanKirk explained how managed security services are “critical” for organizations to defend against a changing threat landscape:

"Driven by our outside-in approach, our new monthly billing option makes it even easier for MSSPs and MSPs to offer their customers the best protection available, without the upfront investment required for an annual subscription."

A Closer Look at What SonicWall Offers

According to SonicWall, new monthly billing models align with how MSSPs and MSPs go to market and feature the following:

SonicWall's said that its monthly billing model is available now for SonicWall MSSPs and approved MSPs. SonicWall partners may apply for access via the SonicWall Partner Portal.

As Jason Carter, SonicWall chief revenue officer, explained:

"We are committed to providing MSPs and MSSPs with the technology and support they need to succeed. Our firewall security services with monthly billing will help our partners deliver advanced cybersecurity services to their customers, while also simplifying their own billing and administration processes."
